game.name: Dungeon Explorer
game.shortDescription: 던전 탐색기는 세계 질서를 위협하는 고대의 악을 중지 위험한 지하 감옥으로 내림차순 용감한 기사로 재생 동적 하향식 액션 슈팅 게임이다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeon explorer - A brave knight goes to a dangerous dungeon after he heard that the ancient evil has awakened again and is trying to break through to the surface .. Stop the hordes of opponents and their master before it's too late, the fate of the world is in your hands!
